about.title: About Yellamma Thalli Devasthanam
about.subtitle: Our Sacred Journey
about.description: Yellamma Thalli Devasthanam stands as a beacon of spiritual enlightenment, preserving ancient Hindu traditions while embracing modern seekers. Our temple serves as a sanctuary for devotion, learning, and community service.
about.historyText: Founded with a vision to preserve and propagate the teachings of Goddess Yellamma, our temple has served the community for generations. We continue the sacred traditions passed down through centuries while adapting to contemporary spiritual needs.
about.missionText: To provide a sacred space where devotees can connect with the divine, learn ancient wisdom, and serve the community. We strive to maintain the purity of Hindu traditions while making spiritual growth accessible to all.
about.communityText: Our temple actively engages in community service, educational programs, and charitable activities. We believe in the principle of 'Service to humanity is service to God'.
about.yellammaDesc: The presiding deity, embodying protection, strength, and maternal love.
about.traditionsDesc: Daily rituals, festivals, and ceremonies following ancient Hindu practices.
